paper.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Goal-Based Investing Under Regime-Switching
paper.abstract: Goal-based investing focuses on helping investors achieve specific financial goals, shifting away from the volatility-based risk paradigm. While numerous methods exist for this type of problem, the majority of them struggle to properly capture the non-stationary dynamics of real-world financial markets. This paper introduces a novel deep reinforcement learning framework for goal-based investing that addresses market non-stationarity through prompt reactions to regime switches. It relies on the integration of regime probability estimates directly into the state space. The experimental results indicate that the proposed method significantly outperforms several benchmarks commonly used in goal-based investing.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用深度强化学习框架进行目标导向的投资，旨在帮助投资者实现特定的财务目标，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。论文中提到的市场状态转换和投资策略优化都是投资组合管理中的关键问题。
